import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { RestService } from '../../rest.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-render-blog', templateUrl: './render-blog.component.html', styleUrls: ['./render-blog.component.css'] }) export class RenderBlogComponent { constructor(private RestService: RestService) { } blog: any; ngOnInit(): void { this.loadBlog(); } public loadBlog(): void { this.RestService.get('http://127.0.0.1:5001/blog/1').subscribe(data => { console.log(data); this.blog = data; }); } }

{{ blog.title }}

{{ blog.author.name }}

Fecha de publicación: {{ blog.publishedDate }}
